channel.title: Phoenix-Pkz 666 [Alpha Built 2.0]
channel.description:
[size=24pt][b]THIS IS NOT AN ADVERSITMENT![/b][/size] [img]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa476/7710519441/phoenix.png[/img] [img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/6899/ad1kt.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/352j3th.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2yzbkwp.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/10gxt9c.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/3vl7r.png[/img] // Chaos elemental added on Alpha Built 2.0 [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/taihco.jpg[/img] // Just like rs, Runned by query version 3.0
[b][center][size=14pt]Dedicated Informations About Us. Latest build: 324 Features of build #324 since build #259 - Private chatting redone (Code is much more managed) - Welcome Message script - Friends chat - Melee combat - Creature speaking - Creature skills - Hitsplats - Areas - Item scripts - Ground items (dropping & picking up) - Combat tab - Price checker - Trading - System updater - Multiworld support fixed - LOADS more (internal core, major/minor fixes, etc). For a list of all updates go to the development *I Would recommend using this Server as your experience is high enough, it's mostly coded it has Soul Wars, Clan Wars fully working. Almost all skills fully working. Special Attacks. PVP Bosses G/e And More! [/i][/b] My Computer Can Hold Over 350+ Players In The Momey without an single lagg! Yes thats right, when we had 659 - 662 we had over 100players and we runned on our old Static Laptop Packardbell V666, 100 players without an single lagg! Thats just great? we can hold over 300 Players! Dw lagg is fixed... The Productions For Infortmations Easy - Medium - Hard = Core Welcome Message: Welcome to Phoenix, thank you for visiting our Moparscape page! Feel free to come and visit us! Alex’s Coding History: We got all Added like in normal RuneScape - Jagex!, Anyway this is 637 based on 639 - added RuneScape Cache! But NeverMind thats not sucessfully Importantly... Let’s talk about Alex’s Coding History? Well i Starter coding when i was 11 Years, now as i am 18, Turned 18 in 7 November 2011. Well now i’ve learned coding in a html and programming school in sweden, and i’ve been sucesfully accepted to start coding my own. Pictures are like Eclipse, yes! i have Dementhium 639 Mysql/sql, but i’ve added much more than it had when i downloaded it. Now i’l let people to enjoy my work and time that i’ve spent.. - Thanks Alex![/size][/center][/b]
[size=24pt][b]THIS IS NOT AN ADVERSITMENT![/b][/size]

item.title: Phoenix-Pkz 666 [Alpha Built 2.0]

item.description:

[size=24pt]THIS IS NOT AN ADVERSITMENT![/size]

// Chaos elemental added on Alpha Built 2.0
taihco.jpg1366×768
// Just like rs, Runned by query version 3.0

[b][center][size=14pt]Dedicated Informations About Us. Latest build: 324

Features of build #324 since build #259

  • Private chatting redone (Code is much more managed)
  • Welcome Message script
  • Friends chat
  • Melee combat
  • Creature speaking
  • Creature skills
  • Hitsplats
  • Areas
  • Item scripts
  • Ground items (dropping & picking up)
  • Combat tab
  • Price checker
  • Trading
  • System updater
  • Multiworld support fixed
  • LOADS more (internal core, major/minor fixes, etc).

For a list of all updates go to the development
*I Would recommend using this Server as your experience is high enough, it’s mostly coded it has Soul Wars, Clan Wars fully working.
Almost all skills fully working.
Special Attacks.
PVP
Bosses
G/e
And More!
[/i][/b]
My Computer Can Hold Over 350+ Players In The Momey without an single lagg!
Yes thats right, when we had 659 - 662 we had over 100players and we runned on our old Static Laptop Packardbell V666, 100 players without an single lagg! Thats just great? we can hold over 300 Players!
Dw lagg is fixed…

The Productions For Infortmations Easy - Medium - Hard = Core

Welcome Message:
Welcome to Phoenix, thank you for visiting our Moparscape page! Feel free to come and visit us!

Alex’s Coding History:
We got all Added like in normal RuneScape - Jagex!, Anyway this is 637 based on 639 - added RuneScape Cache!
But NeverMind thats not sucessfully Importantly…
Let’s talk about Alex’s Coding History?
Well i Starter coding when i was 11 Years, now as i am 18, Turned 18 in 7 November 2011.
Well now i’ve learned coding in a html and programming school in sweden, and i’ve been sucesfully accepted to start coding my own.
Pictures are like Eclipse, yes! i have Dementhium 639 Mysql/sql, but i’ve added much more than it had when i downloaded it.
Now i’l let people to enjoy my work and time that i’ve spent…

  • Thanks Alex![/size][/center][/b]

[size=24pt]THIS IS NOT AN ADVERSITMENT![/size]

Read full topic
